definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
darkness comes before dawn/things can only get better (idiom)
pinyin: li2 ming2 qian2 de5 hei1 an4

sentences.english: When I go dhave the long steep Road of Darkness.
sentences.chinese: 當我行走在黑暗而險峻的路上。

sentences.english: The real war will never get in the books.
sentences.chinese: 真正的戰爭永遠會隱沒於歷史的黑暗面。

sentences.english: Skywalker sought to turn him from the dark side.
sentences.chinese: 天行者期望能將他從黑暗面挽救出來。

sentences.english: Whoso curseth his father or his mother, his lamp shall be put out in obscure darkness.
sentences.chinese: 咒罵父母的，他的燈必滅，變爲漆黑的黑暗。

sentences.english: Light abolishes darkness merely by showing you it is not there.
sentences.chinese: 光明只要讓你看到黑暗並不存在。

sentences.english: I am the teeth in the darkness, the talons in the night.
sentences.chinese: 我是，黑暗的尖齒，深夜的魔爪。

sentences.english: Such had been his first dip into the dark abysses of existence.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次跌進人生黑暗深淵的情形就是這樣。

sentences.english: It is our light, and not our darkness, that frightens us.
sentences.chinese: 我們對自己的光明面，而非黑暗面，感到恐懼。

sentences.english: But light struggled with dark in Nixon's soul.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光明與黑暗的對決卻蟄伏於他的內心深處。

sentences.english: Therefore, they present a dark carapace .
sentences.chinese: 因此，他們提出一個黑暗的甲殼。

sentences.english: Face the light or lurk in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 面對光明，或藏伏在黑暗裏。

sentences.english: Darkness and light are the same to You” (Psalm 139:7-12 TEV).
sentences.chinese: 黑暗和光明，在你看都是一樣。

sentences.english: On one of many cold frosty nights, I shut my caravan door behind me and took a step out into the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 在一個寒冷的霜夜，我關上房車的門，慢慢步入黑暗。

sentences.english: Now his darkly comic sensibility is penetrating a temple of high culture.
sentences.chinese: 而今他的黑暗的喜劇元素，進入了高雅文化的殿堂。

sentences.english: A solitary candle light ened the darkness of the room.
sentences.chinese: 一支孤燭使黑暗的房間亮了起來。

sentences.english: I will clothe the heavens with darkness, and will make sackcloth their covering.
sentences.chinese: 我可使黑暗籠罩諸天，使麻衣掩蔽天際。

definition: to degrade/to degenerate/to become depraved/corrupt/a fall from grace
